meanings.definition: A type of candy on a stick.
meanings.sent1: I bought a colorful lollypop at the store.
meanings.sent2: Kids love to eat lollypops at birthday parties.
meanings.sent3: The lollypop made the child smile with delight.
meanings.sent4: Her happiness was as bright as a lollypop on a sunny day.
meanings.sent5: The sweet lollypop melted in my mouth, leaving a sugary taste.

meanings.definition: To suck or lick a lollypop.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys lollypopping on hot summer days.
meanings.sent2: The toddler lollypops happily while walking in the park.
meanings.sent3: He lollypops to pass the time during the long car ride.
meanings.sent4: The cat lollypopped the milk from the bowl with its tongue.
meanings.sent5: The student lollypops on a lollypop absentmindedly while studying.
